body: This NEEDS a translation. Good passionlip art is a rare gem.

Wasn't too sure about the cover art but damn. This is the Passionlip doujin I've wanted. Seemingly vanilla, good humongous size of tits (unlike many other works where she's portrayed just like a regular busty girl) and the artist even got rid of her obnoxious claws. 

Gonna need to ask for a translation here.
